verses.verse: A Psalm of David, to bring to remembrance. O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H3198>rebuke<s%> me not in thy <S%H2534>wrath<s%>; Neither <S%H3256>chasten<s%> me in thy hot <S%H2534>displeasure<s%>.
For thine <S%H2671>arrows<s%> stick <S%H5181>fast<s%> in <S%H3027>me<s%>, And thy hand presseth me <S%H5181>sore<s%>.

There is no <S%H4974>soundness<s%> in my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of thine <S%H2195>indignation<s%>; Neither is there any <S%H7965>health<s%> in my <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of my <S%H2403>sin<s%>.
For mine <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> are gone <S%H5674>over<s%> my <S%H7218>head<s%>: As a <S%H3515>heavy<s%> <S%H4853>burden<s%> they are too heavy for <S%H3513>me<s%>.
My <S%H2250>wounds<s%> are <S%H887>loathsome<s%> and <S%H4743>corrupt<s%>, <S%H6440>Because<s%> of my <S%H200>foolishness<s%>.
I am <S%H5753>pained<s%> and bowed <S%H7817>down<s%> <S%H3966>greatly<s%>; I <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6937>mourning<s%> all the day <S%H3117>long<s%>.
For my <S%H3689>loins<s%> are <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H7033>burning<s%>; And there is no <S%H4974>soundness<s%> in my <S%H1320>flesh<s%>.
I am <S%H6313>faint<s%> and <S%H3966>sore<s%> <S%H1794>bruised<s%>: I have <S%H7580>groaned<s%> by reason of the <S%H5100>disquietness<s%> of my <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
Lord <S%H136><s%>, all my <S%H8378>desire<s%> is before <S%H585>thee<s%>; And my groaning is not hid from <S%H5641>thee<s%>.

My <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5503>throbbeth<s%>, my <S%H3581>strength<s%> <S%H5800>faileth<s%> <S%H216>me<s%>: As for the light of mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, <S%H1992>it<s%> also is gone from <S%H369>me<s%>.
My <S%H157>lovers<s%> and my <S%H7453>friends<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> aloof <S%H5048>from<s%> my <S%H5061>plague<s%>; And my <S%H7138>kinsmen<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> afar <S%H7350>off<s%>.

They also that <S%H1245>seek<s%> after my <S%H5315>life<s%> lay <S%H5367>snares<s%> for <S%H1875>me<s%>; And they that seek my <S%H7451>hurt<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> mischievous <S%H1942>things<s%>, And <S%H1897>meditate<s%> <S%H4820>deceits<s%> all the day <S%H3117>long<s%>.
But <S%H2795>I<s%>, as a deaf <S%H8085>man<s%>, hear <S%H483>not<s%>; And I am as a dumb man that <S%H6605>openeth<s%> not his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.
Yea <S%H376><s%>, I am as a man that <S%H8085>heareth<s%> <S%H6310>not<s%>, And in whose mouth are no <S%H8433>reproofs<s%>.
For in <S%H3068>thee<s%>, O Jehovah, do I <S%H3176>hope<s%>: Thou wilt <S%H6030>answer<s%>, O <S%H136>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>.
For I <S%H559>said<s%>, Lest they <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> over <S%H7272>me<s%>: When my foot <S%H4131>slippeth<s%>, they magnify themselves against <S%H1431>me<s%>.
For I am <S%H3559>ready<s%> to <S%H6761>fall<s%>, And my <S%H4341>sorrow<s%> is continually before <S%H8548>me<s%>.
For I will <S%H5046>declare<s%> mine <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>; I will be <S%H1672>sorry<s%> for my <S%H2403>sin<s%>.
But mine <S%H341>enemies<s%> are <S%H2416>lively<s%>, and are <S%H6105>strong<s%>; And they that <S%H8130>hate<s%> me <S%H8267>wrongfully<s%> are <S%H7231>multiplied<s%>.
They also that <S%H7999>render<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> for <S%H2896>good<s%> Are <S%H7853>adversaries<s%> unto <S%H7291>me<s%>, because I follow the thing that is <S%H2896>good<s%>.
Forsake <S%H5800><s%> me <S%H3068>not<s%>, O Jehovah: O my <S%H430>God<s%>, be not far from <S%H7368>me<s%>.
Make <S%H2363>haste<s%> to <S%H5833>help<s%> <S%H136>me<s%>, O Lord, my <S%H8668>salvation<s%>.
